value:
$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$bEvBg_EmbraAnotherThrone_before|$Fi2000|$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Lady Embla! Are you...all right?$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Is this...a mortal's blood?$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Pain|I...killed him...$k$pI had not meant to. He came to me,
smiling, wishing to make a tribute...$k$pWhy then...did he come at me with a
fearsome look in his eye?$k$pWhy...would he try to kill me?$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|That is the nature of mortals,
Lady Embla...$k$p$EFace_Anger|If your blood can grant them power,
then surely, they think, if they can
take your very life...$k$p$EFace_Cool|They hunger for power. That is why
they can turn on you so easily...
Even when they owe you everything.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|

$WmMPID_ハーディン,ch01_29_Hardin_M_Normal,Face|Princess Nyna... I swear I will protect
you always.$k$p$Sbs1000|
